title: Community for Businesses in Latin America and the Caribbean | ConnectAmericas
description: ConnectAmericas, the first social network for businesses in Latin America and the Caribbean dedicated to promoting international trade and investment
cleaned_text: ALQUIMISTA Company description See translation Nuestra empresa de dedica a cultivar hierbas medicinales para luego envasarlos, solo trabajamos con hierbas medicinales científicamente comprobadas y que estén en tratados de fitofarmacos, el objetivo es complementar la medicina natural con la medicina alopatica en paraguay se consume la medicina natural en gran cantidad, como por ejemplo para la diabetes, colesterol, para la digestión es por ello que estamos en este negocio. HS code: {{pas.hsCode | limitTo: a company has been verified, so it can increase the reliability and visibility of its profile. This company has declared that: - Its general management and/or its budget decisions in charge of women, or; - At least 51% of the company is owned by 1 or more women Contact information [Sign in](javascript:void(0);) People in this company (1) Contact this company through Start-Up Nation Central To get in touch with the ConnectAmericas support team, please send an e-mail with your request to soporte@connectamericas.com and we will get back
